about_the_game:
Welcome to the demo version of Dragon's Ruler!

[The difference between the demo version and the full version]

The demo version has only 11 territories while the full version has 125 territories.
In the demo version, the game is over when the player controls more than 3 territories.

There are no boss characters in the demo version, and there is no ending.
The saved data of the demo version is not compatible with the full version.
The demo version is older than the full version. It may not have the latest updates.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains nudity and skin exposure that is not intended to be sexually explicit.
